ygData.subject: Re: Stone Guardians
ygData.msgSnippet: You can get stone golems near the enterance to lavastorm from neriak, neriake side...area around there i ve seen people fighting them...mebbe they train them
ygData.messageBody:
You can get stone golems near the enterance to lavastorm from neriak,
neriake side...area around there i've seen people fighting them...mebbe they
"train" them there, but that means they're near by.

I simply remember my favorite things,
David Asher Brown
Xymox
Karana server

-----Original Message-----
From: Ben Pocock <bpocock@...>
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 1:35 PM
Subject: [EQ-Quest] Stone Guardians


>From: bpocock@... (Ben Pocock)
>
>I was trying to make up a guild quest that would be extremely
>challenging to my members. I have a lot of people levels 12 - 19 or
>so. I was going to play an archvillian who demanded a ramson for
>returning the guildmaster. That sounded interesting, but also didn't
>pose much of a challenge since I was going to hold it in Lavastorm.
>
>So, I got to thinking that the stone guardians in the forest seem to
>con black to me. Is there anyway a large group (10+) players could
>take on some iron or stone guardians? And, what do they drop so I
>could ask for proof of the kill (and I always assume my guildmembers
>are honest when it comes to loot).
>--------------------------------------------------
>Ben Pocock
>bpocock@...
